name: Electropole
Lore: 'Gungan weapon that is very similar to the Force pike. Used to control crowds, wild animals, and the occasional battle droid.',
Text: 'Deploy on your Gungan. May target a character for free. Draw destiny. If destiny > defense value, character is power -4 for remainder of turn. At the end of battle here, may place this electropole on top of Reserve Deck.',
